data.body:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1770992624769-htws6w.
Objective: Ship all independent open P0 tasks — UI polish, hotkeys, filters, navigation
Agent plan:
- 3 x frontend (ui)
- 1 x frontend (hotkeys)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-31f: the blue dot next to the bead id in the terminal should blink when the terminal is running
- foolery-5ws: Status filter should show Ready option
- foolery-75n: shift o hotkey to create notes
- foolery-ajb: show hot key lightbox by default
- foolery-iki: cmd shift R always goes to All Repositories
- foolery-k18: don't make all repositories default state
- foolery-l8n: toggling between orchestrate and list throws away all the orchestration state
- foolery-smj: remove Fooler header text from top left corner of /beads
- foolery-tu0: after hitting shift-v on bead, the next item should be in focus
- foolery-wrb: improved parsing and display of orchestration console
Notes: All 10 tasks are independent. Suggested grouping: Agent 1 (hotkeys): 75n, ajb, tu0. Agent 2 (navigation/filters): 5ws, iki, k18. Agent 3 (orchestration/display): l8n, wrb, 31f. Agent 4 (UI cleanup): smj.
Assumptions:
- External dependency foolery-s3q is assumed resolvable — if not, foolery-cxc moves to wave 2 or is flagged blocked.
- foolery-wrb is treated as a separate task from foolery-a3b despite identical titles (wrb appears to be the open redo of the verified a3b).
- Wave epics (060, 5mt) are coordination beads — 060 closes when its child work is done, 5mt opens for planning.
- Non-P0 beads (P1, P2, P4) are excluded per planning objective.
